title: Juan

properties.name: description
properties.value: Juan was an Iron Man Tutor located on Tutorial Island and outside Lumbridge Castle. Juan, along with Adam and Paul, could set a player's account to Ironman mode while on Tutorial Island, and gave Ironman armour, hardcore ironman armour, and ultimate ironman armour to Ironman players in Lumbridge.

content:
Juan was removed after an update.
As the contents of this page no longer exist in Old School RuneScape, this article is preserved for historical purposes.
Juan
Released10 November 2016 (Update)
Removal25 October 2018 (Update)
MembersNo
RaceHuman
LocationTutorial Island, Lumbridge
GenderMale
ExamineA Hardcore Iron Man.
Map
Advanced data
NPC IDremoved

Juan was an Iron Man Tutor located on Tutorial Island and outside Lumbridge Castle. Juan, along with Adam and Paul, could set a player's account to Ironman mode while on Tutorial Island, and gave Ironman armour, hardcore ironman armour, and ultimate ironman armour to Ironman players in Lumbridge.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Juan's name is a play on how "Juan" is pronounced similarly to "one", referencing the one life hardcore ironman players have.

[[File:Juan chathead.png|left]]
'''Juan''' was an Iron Man Tutor located on [[Tutorial Island]] and outside [[Lumbridge Castle]]. Juan, along with [[Adam]] and [[Paul]], could set a player's account to [[Ironman mode]] while on [[Tutorial Island]], and gave [[Ironman armour]], [[hardcore ironman armour]], and [[ultimate ironman armour]] to Ironman players in [[Lumbridge]].

==Trivia==
*Juan's name is a play on how "Juan" is pronounced similarly to "one", referencing the one life hardcore ironman players have.
